name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret Festival 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Eclectic Sounds**

The 2026 edition of Best Kept Secret brings together an exciting and diverse lineup of 52 artists, showcasing a wide spectrum of genres and styles. From Electronic and Hip-Hop to Post-Punk and Indie Rock, the festival continues its tradition of curating an eclectic mix of sounds, with standout contributions from genres like R&B, Psychedelic Rock, and Funk. With 98.1% of the artists featuring Spotify links, attendees can easily explore and connect with this rich musical tapestry ahead of the festival.

The festival boasts an impressive international presence, with artists hailing from 16 countries. While the USA and the Netherlands lead the pack with 11 and 10 acts respectively, the lineup also features talent from the UK, Australia, Ghana, South Africa, and beyond, reflecting a global celebration of music. The diversity extends to representation, with 12 artists identifying as people of color and an inclusive gender mix, showcasing male, female, non-binary, and mixed-gender acts.

With an average rating of 7.2 based on 76.9% of the lineup, the festival has been met with favorable reception. The majority of rated artists fall in the 7-8 range, with a strong showing in the 8-9 category as well. Best Kept Secret 2026 promises to deliver a dynamic and inclusive experience for music lovers, blending established names with fresh, innovative acts from around the world. Whether you're a fan of electronic beats, soulful melodies, or raw rock energy, this year's festival offers something for everyone.
